items.label: ورود اطلاعات مربوط به كليه فرآيندهاي سيستم

items.name: Process_Group_UID
items.label: گروه فرآيندي
items.sql:
SELECT CATEGORY_UID, CATEGORY_NAME
FROM PROCESS_CATEGORY
ORDER BY CATEGORY_NAME

items.name: Select_Process
items.label: انتخاب فرآيند
items.sql:
SELECT NULL ID, "فرآيند را انتخاب كنيد" Process_Code

UNION

(SELECT ID,CONCAT (Process_Title," || ", Process_Code)
FROM PMT_TB100007
WHERE Process_Group_UID = '@#Process_Group_UID' and Isdelete = "0"
ORDER BY Process_Code)
